scripts.up: sudo docker compose pull && sudo docker compose $COMPOSE_ARGS up $DOCKER_ARGS
scripts.dev: npm run down && COMPOSE_ARGS="-f docker-compose.dev.yml" DOCKER_ARGS="--build" npm run up
scripts.update: npm run pull && docker compose pull && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d" npm run up
scripts.update-service: npm run pull && docker compose pull && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d $SERVICE" npm run up
scripts.start: npm run pull && docker compose pull && DOCKER_ARGS="--force-recreate -d" npm run up
